column4: i was thinking ONE or the OTHER got read by the login shells..
xterm -ls, would read .bash_profile if it exists not .bashrc,,, normal xterm would read just .bashrc :)
to test all this you can put a 'echo This is .bash_profile' or similer line at the start of eah file.. to see when each one is getting read.
and you can 'source'  one from the others.. ie. .bash_profile could 'source .bashrc'  at the end.
